20.name: Fury of the Storm

heroTrait.description: Lay a Creep Tumor that generates Creep. You and your summons move 20% faster on Creep and restore a small amount of Health each second. Tumors last 240 seconds.

1.longDescription: Stores up to 2 charges.

primaryAbilities.name: Spin to Win!
primaryAbilities.description: The Vikings use a highly advanced Nordic battle tactic, spinning wildly and giving every enemy caught within their whirl a solid knock on the head.

heroicAbilites.description: The trio ensures no Viking is left behind with this heroic ability, which allows any one of them to quickly raise fallen Vikings and gather the whole group in one spot.

heroTrait.description: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second

heroicAbilites.description: Create an expanding nova of wind, dealing heavy damage and pushing enemies away.

20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

primaryAbilities.name: Impale

primaryAbilities.name: Harden Carapace

heroicAbilites.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon for 8 seconds. Enemies wrapped in the cocoon are unable to act and are untargetable. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

heroTrait.name: Scarab Host
heroTrait.description: Spawn a Beetle at Anub'arak's location whenever he casts a spell. Beetles last for 10 seconds, attacking nearby enemies for light damage.

1.name: Invigoration

1.name: Block
1.longDescription: Stores up to 2 charges.

primaryAbilities.name: Hamstring

20.description: Adds Run and Gun charges and reduces Mana cost
20.longDescription: Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

primaryAbilities.name: Overkill
primaryAbilities.description: Deal massive damage to the target and heavy damage to nearby targets over 5 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target. Can move and use Abilities while channeling.

primaryAbilities.name: Frag Grenade
primaryAbilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals moderate damage, knocking enemies away.

primaryAbilities.name: Run and Gun
primaryAbilities.description: Charge forward and instantly wind up the Minigun.

heroicAbilites.name: Commandeer Odin
heroicAbilites.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. Lasts 23 seconds.

heroicAbilites.name: Drakken Laser Drill
heroicAbilites.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing moderate damage. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Minigun
heroTrait.description: Your Attack Speed increases the longer that you attack, becoming fully wound up after 4 Basic Attacks. Lasts 3 seconds.

1.name: Transcendence
1.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 75.92 (+4% per level).

1.name: Iron Fists
1.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 125% bonus damage.

1.name: Insight
1.description: Quest: Basic Attacks restore mana, lower cooldowns
1.longDescription: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 14.56 (+4% per level) Mana and grants a stack of Insight. Reward: Once you have 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces the cooldown of all your Basic Abilities by 1 second.

4.description: Radiant Dash reveals the area
4.longDescription: Radiant Dash reveals the area around the target for 3 seconds. Only one area can be revealed at a time.

4.description: Deadly Reach attacks increase Move Speed
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks while Deadly Reach is active increase your Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

4.description: Activate to place a ward which heals in an area
4.longDescription: Activate to place a ward on the ground that heals allies in an area for 1.95% of their maximum Health every second for 10 seconds.

4.name: Protective Shield
4.description: Activate to shield an allied Hero
4.longDescription: Activate to shield an allied Hero for 15% of their max Health for 5 seconds.

7.name: Echo of Heaven
7.description: Breath of Heaven heals a second time
7.longDescription: Breath of Heaven heals a second time 2 seconds later for 35%.

7.description: Radiant Dash launches a volley of blows
7.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an enemy causes you to launch a volley of blows dealing 255.84 (+4% per level) total damage instead of a Basic Attack.

7.name: Clairvoyance
7.description: Activate to reveal target area and nearby enemies
7.longDescription: Enemies in the area are revealed for 4 seconds.

7.longDescription: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

10.name: Seven-Sided Strike
10.description: Become Invulnerable and strike nearby Heroes

13.name: Quicksilver
13.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives you and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.longDescription: Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

13.name: Relentless
13.longDescription: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against your Hero by 50%.

13.name: Fists of Fury
13.longDescription: Increases Deadly Reach's duration by 50%.

16.name: Soothing Breeze
16.description: Breath of Heaven removes silences, blinds, slows and roots
16.longDescription: Breath of Heaven removes silences, blinds, slows and roots.

16.name: Circle of Life
16.description: Increases Breath of Heaven healing per nearby ally
16.longDescription: Increases Breath of Heaven's healing by 10% for each allied Hero in the cast range.

16.name: Blinding Speed
16.longDescription: Decreases Radiant Dash's cooldown by 2 seconds and increases the maximum number of charges by 1.

16.name: Blazing Fists
16.description: Basic Attacks reduce Deadly Reach cooldown
16.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 1 second.

20.name: Peaceful Repose
20.description: Reduces Divine Palm cooldown if they do not die
20.longDescription: Divine Palm's cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.

20.name: Transgression
20.description: Seven-Sided Strike hits more
20.longDescription: Seven-Sided Strike hits 4 additional times.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies
20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.name: Epiphany
20.description: Activate to restore Mana and Radiant Dash charges
20.longDescription: Activate to restore 32.81% of your maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.

primaryAbilities.name: Radiant Dash
primaryAbilities.description: Jump to target ally or enemy. Enemy targets are hit with a Basic Attack. 2 charges.

primaryAbilities.name: Breath of Heaven
primaryAbilities.description: Heal yourself and nearby allies for a moderate amount and give 10% movement speed for 3 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Deadly Reach

heroicAbilites.description: Become Invulnerable while striking the highest health nearby enemy hero for 7% of their maximum health up to 7 times.

heroicAbilites.name: Divine Palm
heroicAbilites.description: If the target ally would be killed within the next 3 seconds they are instead healed for a large amount.

heroTrait.description: Choose between Transcendence, Iron Fists, and Insight from the Talents panel.

10.name: Precision Strike
10.description: Area attack with unlimited range
10.longDescription: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 474.24 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

13.description: Removes Snipe Mana cost and increases range

13.longDescription: Snipe also deals 50% damage to enemies near the impact.

16.name: Lethal Decoy
16.longDescription: Holo Decoy deals 40% of Nova's damage.

20.name: Precision Barrage

20.longDescription: Precision Strike holds 2 charges with a short cooldown.

20.description: Activate to reset cooldowns
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

primaryAbilities.name: Snipe

heroicAbilites.description: After a short delay, deals massive damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

13.longDescription: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

20.name: Presence Of Mind
20.description: Increases Pyroblast radius and lowers cooldown

20.longDescription: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

20.description: Increases Flamestrike's range
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If you hit 2 or more Heroes, Flamestrike's cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Flamestrike
primaryAbilities.description: After a short delay, deal heavy damage in an area. Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50% and also increases damage dealt.

primaryAbilities.name: Living Bomb
primaryAbilities.description: Deal heavy damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing moderate damage to all nearby enemies. Casting a second Living Bomb on an enemy causes the previous Living Bomb to explode immediately. Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

primaryAbilities.name: Gravity Lapse
primaryAbilities.description: Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit.

heroicAbilites.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing light damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for light damage and splashing for 50%.

heroicAbilites.name: Pyroblast
heroicAbilites.description: After 2 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals massive damage to an enemy Hero and nearby enemies.

1.longDescription: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage, to a max of 40 damage. Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 30% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

20.longDescription: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage.

primaryAbilities.name: Gilnean Cocktail
primaryAbilities.description: Hurl a flask that does moderate damage to the  first enemy hit and explodes for massive damage to enemies in a cone behind them.

primaryAbilities.name: Inner Beast
primaryAbilities.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.

primaryAbilities.name: Darkflight
primaryAbilities.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing heavy damage.

heroicAbilites.name: Go for the Throat
heroicAbilites.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing 3 times for massive total damage. If this kills them, this ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

heroicAbilites.name: Marked for the Kill
heroicAbilites.description: Shapeshift into a Human and fire a shot hitting the first enemy Hero for moderate damage. For 5 seconds, they are Vulnerable, taking 25% more damage, and you can re-activate this to leap at them and shapeshift into a Worgen.

heroTrait.name: Curse of the Worgen
heroTrait.description: Use certain Abilities to shift between a Human and a Worgen. While Human, your Basic Attack is ranged. While Worgen, your Basic Attack is melee but deals 40% more damage.

1.name: Pressurized Glands
1.description: Increases Spike Burst range and decreases cooldown
1.longDescription: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Survival Instincts
1.longDescription: Increases Locust's Health by 50% and duration by 40%.

1.name: Regenerative Microbes
1.longDescription: Symbiote's Carapace heals the target for 70.72 (+4% per level) Health per second over 4 seconds.

1.name: Envenomed Nest
1.longDescription: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.

4.name: Prolific Dispersal
4.description: Increases Toxic Nest charges
4.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Toxic Nest by 2 seconds and adds 2 additional charges.

4.name: Ballistospores
4.description: Toxic Nests have global range and last longer
4.longDescription: Increases Toxic Nest's range to global and increases duration by 25%.

4.name: Sustained Carapace
4.description: Increases Carapace shield and persists after Symbiote
4.longDescription: Increases the Shield amount of Symbiote's Carapace by 40% and allows it to persist after Symbiote ends.

4.name: Adrenal Overload
4.description: Symbiote host gains Attack Speed
4.longDescription: Symbiote host gains 25% increased Attack Speed.

7.name: Needlespine
7.longDescription: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

7.name: Vile Nest
7.longDescription: Toxic Nests slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Networked Carapace
7.longDescription: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

7.name: Calldown: MULE
7.description: Activate to heal and rearm Structures
7.longDescription: 3 seconds.

10.name: Ultimate Evolution
10.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it
10.longDescription: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

10.name: Evolve Monstrosity
10.description: Minion or Locust becomes a powerful Monstrosity
10.longDescription: This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on your Monstrosity.

13.name: Assault Strain
13.longDescription: Locust Basic Attacks cleave for 50% damage, and explode on death for 106.08 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: Bombard Strain
13.longDescription: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack that deal 70% more damage.

13.name: Spatial Efficiency
13.longDescription: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its Cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.

13.name: Soma Transference
13.description: Spike Burst heals for each Hero hit
13.longDescription: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 66.56 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

16.name: Envenomed Spikes
16.longDescription: Your Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Adrenaline Boost
16.longDescription: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

16.name: Locust Brood
16.longDescription: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

16.name: Volatile Mutation
16.longDescription: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 142.48 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die.

20.name: Evolutionary Link
20.description: Ultimate Evolution target gets a Shield
20.longDescription: Refreshes every 5 seconds.

20.name: Evolution Complete
20.description: Monstrosity gains Deep Tunnel
20.longDescription: Monstrosity gains the ability to Deep Tunnel to any visible location once every 25 seconds.

20.name: Hivemind
20.description: Symbiote two targets
20.longDescription: This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and shielding.

20.name: Locust Nest
20.description: Create Locust Nests
20.longDescription: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

primaryAbilities.name: Symbiote
primaryAbilities.description: Assist another allied Unit or Combat Structure, allowing you to shield them and use new Abilities.  Cannot be used on another Hero's Summons.

primaryAbilities.name: Toxic Nest
primaryAbilities.description: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals moderate damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds.

heroicAbilites.name: Ultimate Evolution
heroicAbilites.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

heroicAbilites.name: Evolve Monstrosity
heroicAbilites.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 30 times. The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from Minions and Structures.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows you to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.

heroTrait.name: Locust Strain
heroTrait.description: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 25 seconds.

1.name: Pursuit of Flame
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame. Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by -98.9%.

1.name: Glyph of Drain Life
1.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life
1.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25%.

1.name: Echoed Corruption
1.description: Hit Heroes with Corruption to increase strikes
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 35 enemy Heroes with Corruption. Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

1.name: Chaotic Energy
1.description: Gather Regen Globes to reduce Mana costs
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regen Globe causes your next Basic Ability with a Mana cost to refund 40 Mana Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes your Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

4.name: Health Funnel
4.description: Killing enemies with Drain Life reduces its cooldown
4.longDescription: If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is reduced by 7 seconds.

4.name: Improved Life Tap
4.description: Life Tap restores more Mana
4.longDescription: Life Tap now restores 35% Mana

4.name: Consume Soul
4.description: Instantly kill an enemy Minion to heal
4.longDescription: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 379.6 (+4% per level) Health. Stores 2 charges.

7.name: Bound by Shadow
7.description: Fel Flame hits reduce the cooldown of Corruption
7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1 second.

7.name: Devour the Frail
7.description: Drain Life deals more damage to weakened enemies
7.longDescription: Drain Life deals 50% more damage to enemies below 50% Health.

7.name: Curse of Exhaustion
7.longDescription: Upon expiration, Corruption slows enemy Movement Speed by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Hunger for Power
7.description: Gain Ability Power but reduce healing received
7.longDescription: Increases Ability Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

10.name: Horrify
10.description: Deals damage and fears Heroes
10.longDescription: After a short delay, deal 124.8 (+4% per level) damage and fear enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

10.name: Rain of Destruction
10.description: Summon a rain of meteors in an area
10.longDescription: Summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 171.6 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.

13.name: Fel Armor
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants a Spell Shield, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Harvest Life
13.longDescription: Drain Life heals for 50% more Health when used on Heroes.

13.name: Dark Bargain
13.description: Increases Death Respawn timer and Health
13.longDescription: Your maximum Health is permanently increased by 25% but your Death Respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.

13.name: Healthstone
13.longDescription: Activate to heal for 25% of your maximum Health.

16.name: Rampant Hellfire
16.longDescription: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 8% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

16.name: Ruinous Affliction
16.longDescription: Corruption deals an additional 81.12 (+4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 242.32 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Darkness Within
16.description: Gain Ability Power after using Life Tap
16.longDescription: After using Life Tap, the next ability you cast has 25% increased Ability Power.

20.name: Haunt
20.description: Increases duration and makes enemies Vulnerable
20.longDescription: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second and feared enemies become Vulnerable, taking 25% increased damage.

20.name: Deep Impact
20.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemy Movement Speed
20.longDescription: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Circle
20.description: Summon a Demonic Circle that you can teleport to
20.longDescription: Summon a Demonic Circle at your location. Activate to teleport to the Demonic Circle.

primaryAbilities.name: Fel Flame
primaryAbilities.description: Release a wave of flame, dealing massive damage to enemies.

primaryAbilities.name: Drain Life
primaryAbilities.description: Drain the life from an enemy over 3 seconds, dealing heavy damage each second and healing Gul'dan for a large amount of Health.

primaryAbilities.name: Corruption
primaryAbilities.description: Call forth 3 bursts of shadow energy, dealing massive damage over 6 seconds. Corruption can stack up to 3 times on an enemy.

heroicAbilites.name: Horrify
heroicAbilites.description: After a short delay, deal heavy damage and cast Fear on enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

heroicAbilites.name: Rain of Destruction
heroicAbilites.description: Summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals heavy damage in a small area.

heroTrait.name: Life Tap
heroTrait.description: Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana. Activate to restore 25% Mana at the cost of some of your Health.

1.name: Compounding Aether
1.longDescription: Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes with Sand Blast increase its damage by 100.

1.name: Deep Breathing
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 2, up to 50. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 150 and also increase your sight radius by 100%.

1.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Mana Regeneration by 0.102, up to 1.523. Reward: After gathering 15 Globes you also gain 5% Ability Power.

1.name: Peer Into The Future
1.longDescription: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds.

4.name: Piercing Sands
4.description: Sand Blast hits two targets
4.longDescription: Sand Blast will now hit the first two Heroes in its path.

4.name: Bronze Talons
4.description: Increases Basic Attack range and damage
4.longDescription: Increases your Basic Attack range by 35%. Using Sand Blast increases the damage of your next Basic Attack by 250%.

4.name: Enveloping Assault
4.description: Increases the radius of Dragon's Breath
4.longDescription: Increases Dragon's Breath's radius by 25%.

7.name: Mobius Loop
7.description: Reduces Dragon's Breath Mana, cooldown, damage
7.longDescription: Reduces Dragon's Breath's Mana cost and cooldown by 50%, but also reduces its damage by 25%.

7.name: Dragon's Eye
7.description: Dragon's Breath damages more in the center
7.longDescription: Dragon's Breath does 25% more damage to enemies in the center.

7.name: Chrono Sickness
7.description: Reduces Time Trap cooldown and adds slow
7.longDescription: Reduces Time Trap's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%. After the Stasis ends, the enemy is also slowed by 50% for 4 seconds.

10.name: Slowing Sands
10.description: Create slowing area
10.longDescription: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

10.name: Temporal Loop
10.description: Return an enemy Hero to a previous position
10.longDescription: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where you cast Temporal Loop on them.

13.name: Bye Bye!
13.longDescription: Reduces the cast time of your Hearthstone by 75%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.

13.name: Reaching through Time
13.description: Increases Sand Blast and Dragon's Breath range
13.longDescription: Increases Sand Blast and Dragon's Breath's range by 25%.

13.name: Time Out
13.longDescription: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 7 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

16.name: Shifting Sands
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast increases your Ability Power by 8% for the next 10 seconds. This bonus can be stacked up to 40%, and the duration is refreshed whenever you damage enemy Heroes with Sand Blast.

16.name: Fast Forward
16.description: Long range Sand Blasts reduce its cooldown
16.longDescription: If Sand Blast travels at least 75% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Quantum Overdrive
16.longDescription: Activate to increase Ability Power by 20% for 10 seconds.

20.name: Pocket of Time
20.description: Removes Slowing Sands Mana cost and increases slow
20.longDescription: Removes Slowing Sands Mana cost and increases the slow from 60% to 80%.

20.name: Loophole
20.description: Temporal Loop now hits multiple Heroes
20.longDescription: Temporal Loop hits all enemy Heroes near your initial target.

20.name: Past and Future Me
20.description: Sand Blast is remembered and re-cast
20.longDescription: After casting Sand Blast, leave an echo of yourself behind. The next time you cast Sand Blast, the echo also casts an untalented Sand Blast that does 40% damage.

20.name: Andorhal Anomaly
20.description: Increases Time Trap charges
20.longDescription: When your cooldown finishes, you gain 3 charges at once.

primaryAbilities.name: Sand Blast
primaryAbilities.description: After 1 second, fire a missile that deals massive damage to the first enemy Hero hit.

primaryAbilities.name: Dragon's Breath
primaryAbilities.description: Fire a blast into the air that lands after 1.5 seconds, dealing massive damage to enemies in an area. Enemies cannot see where the blast will land.

primaryAbilities.name: Time Trap
primaryAbilities.description: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. The first enemy Hero to touch it will be put in Stasis for 2 seconds. Only 1 trap can exist at once.

heroicAbilites.name: Slowing Sands
heroicAbilites.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active, the more it slows, up to 50% after 5 seconds.

heroicAbilites.name: Temporal Loop
heroicAbilites.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will be teleported back to the location where you cast Temporal Loop on them.

heroTrait.name: Timewalker
heroTrait.description: Youve traveled to the future, and as such, will learn your Talents 1 level earlier than your teammates!

1.name: Stable Portal
1.longDescription: Increases Portal duration by 50%.

1.name: Portal Mastery
1.longDescription: Activate your Trait to cancel an unlinked Portal.

1.name: Raven's Intellect
1.longDescription: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana Regeneration by 100%.

4.name: Mage Armor
4.description: Using a Portal grants Block
4.longDescription: Allies gain Block the first time they use a Portal, reducing damage taken from the next 3 enemy Heroic Basic Attacks by 50%. Lasts 5 seconds.

4.name: Bird's Eye View
4.description: Increases Raven Form vision range
4.longDescription: Permanently increase Raven Form's vision range by 25%. Activate to increase this bonus to 200% for 5 seconds.

4.name: Dust of Appearance
4.description: Reveal Heroes in the surrounding area
4.longDescription: Activate to reveal enemy Heroes in the area surrounding Medivh for 10 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.

7.name: Arcane Charge
7.description: Arcane Rift deals more damage after hitting a Hero
7.longDescription: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 30% more damage.

7.name: The Master's Touch
7.longDescription: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying. Reward: Permanently increases the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.

7.name: Arcane Explosion
7.description: Force of Will deals area damage
7.longDescription: The first time Force of Will absorbs damage, it deals 190.32 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Raven Familiar
7.description: Using a Portal grants a Raven Familiar
7.longDescription: A Raven Familiar joins allies that use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack target for 118.56 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: Poly Bomb
10.description: Polymorph a Hero that spreads to other Heroes
10.longDescription: Polymorph an enemy Hero, suppressing their attacks and Silencing them for 2 seconds. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

10.name: Ley Line Seal
10.description: Unleash a wave that disables enemy Heroes
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that imprisons enemy Heroes in Stasis for 3 seconds.

13.name: Quickening
13.longDescription: Reduces Portal cooldown by 50%.

13.name: Astral Projection
13.longDescription: Increases Portal cast range by 50%.

13.name: Winds of Celerity
13.longDescription: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

16.name: Circle of Protection
16.description: Force of Will shields allies near the target
16.longDescription: An untalented Force of Will is also applied to allies near the target.

16.name: Enduring Will
16.longDescription: Increases Force of Will duration by 33.333%.

16.name: Reabsorption
16.description: Force of Will heals the target
16.longDescription: Upon expiration, Force of Will heals the target for 50% of the damage it absorbed.

20.name: Glyph Of Poly Bomb
20.description: Poly Bomb spreads faster and farther
20.longDescription: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.

20.name: Medivh Cheats!
20.description: Ley Line Seal can be redirected while active
20.longDescription: Increase the duration of the Stasis effect by 33.333% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.

20.name: Guardian of Tirisfal
20.description: Arcane Rift kills Minions instantly
20.longDescription: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

20.name: Arcane Brilliance
20.description: Grant Ability Power and Mana to allies
20.longDescription: Activate to instantly restore 200 mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 10% Ability Power for 10 seconds.

20.name: Invisibility
20.description: Stealth an allied Hero
20.longDescription: 2 charges.

primaryAbilities.name: Arcane Rift
primaryAbilities.description: Launch a Rift that deals moderate damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce Arcane Rift's cooldown by 5 seconds and refund a moderate amount of mana.

primaryAbilities.name: Force of Will
primaryAbilities.description: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Portal
primaryAbilities.description: Create a set of portals between you and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.

heroicAbilites.name: Poly Bomb
heroicAbilites.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero, suppressing their attacks and Silencing them for 2 seconds. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

heroicAbilites.name: Ley Line Seal
heroicAbilites.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that imprisons enemy Heroes in Stasis for 3 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Raven Form
heroTrait.description: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 15%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.
